name: Antidote & Detox Methods
description: Training in counteracting poisons, venom, and synthetic biochem threats through antidotes, natural detox, and biochemical repair.

cards.title: Emergency Antidotes for Common Industrial Poisons
cards.description: Using pharmaceutical and holistic antidotes for known toxins used in industrial and biochem warfare.
cards.bulletpoints: Activated charcoal, NAC, sodium thiosulfate, chelation therapy

cards.title: Natural Detoxification Against Heavy Metals & Neurotoxins
cards.description: Using herbal and natural methods to expel heavy metals and neurological toxins from the body.
cards.bulletpoints: Zeolite, chlorella, spirulina, cilantro detox protocols

cards.title: Reversing DNA & Organ Damage from Mutagenic Agents
cards.description: Strategies for reversing the effects of genetic-modifying bioweapons and organ-damaging toxins.
cards.bulletpoints: Molecular hydrogen therapy, fasting-induced autophagy, mitochondrial repair compounds
